short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh Zendesk ticket page without refreshing the entire page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on let's you automatically refresh the Zendesk ticket page without refreshing the whole tab which removes filters etc.
You can set the refresh interval when clicking on the add-on icon in the browser.

You can find the code on Github so it can be validated by IT departments to be allowed in companies with strict security requirements.
Github link: https://github.com/LucaBrianPTW/ZendeskAutoRefresh

The same add-on is available both for Firefox and Chromium-based browsers!
Firefox link: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/zendeskautorefresh/
